chunk_summary.description: Summarizes individual text chunks for hierarchical processing

meta_summary.prompt:
Analyze these chunk summaries to identify the overall narrative thread. Return ONLY valid JSON:

{{ "filename": "main-topic-name", "summary": "Overall summary covering main questions, actions, and themes from the transcript.", "tags": ["theme1", "action1", "topic1"] }}

Chunk summaries:
{text}

Extract:
- filename: Main topic/purpose using hyphens
- summary: Key questions asked, main actions discussed, central themes (max 400 chars, no quotes)
- tags: Important themes, actions, and topics mentioned

JSON:
meta_summary.description: Creates final metadata from hierarchical chunk summaries

combined_metadata.prompt:
Return ONLY this exact JSON format. Do not add extra fields or change the structure:

{{ "filename": "REPLACE_WITH_TOPIC", "summary": "REPLACE_WITH_SUMMARY", "tags": ["REPLACE_WITH_TAG1", "REPLACE_WITH_TAG2", "REPLACE_WITH_TAG3"] }}

Replace the placeholder values:
- REPLACE_WITH_TOPIC: main topic using hyphens (like healthcare-integration)
- REPLACE_WITH_SUMMARY: 2-3 sentences about the content (no quotes, no line breaks, max 400 chars)
- REPLACE_WITH_TAG1/2/3: relevant keywords (lowercase, use hyphens)

Content to analyze:
{text}

JSON:
combined_metadata.description: Fallback single-step metadata generation for smaller content
